author: Special Correspondent
V S
text:
RELIGION

Mata Amritanandamayi Math: Brahmasthanam Temple festival, Mata Amritananda Mayi takes part, Nallampalayam Math premises, 10:30 a.m.

Rathina Vinayakar Temple: Sashti, temple premises, DB Road, R.S. Puram, 8.30 a.m.

Jeevajothi: family fellowship, Gujarat Samaj, Near North Coimbatore Chinthamani,

10.30 a.m.

GENERAL

Kamban Kazhagam: 44{+t}{+h}anniversary celebrations, Mani High School, Pappanaickenpalayam, 5.45 p.m.

Kovai Aram Trust: Release of documentary on self-confidence of Kalaimamani S.R. Krishnamurthy’s achievements, Tamil College, Perur, 10 a.m.

Rotary District 3201: Inauguration of the Rotary District Conference, K.V. Chowdary, Chief Vigilance Commissioner, takes part, Hotel Le Meridian, 9 a.m.

British Council: Education @ UK Exhibition, The Residency, Avanashi Road, 12 noon.

GRD Institute of Management: Face to face with Dr.Kiran Bedi IPS, college premises, 2 p.m.

Smt.D.Padmavathi Ammal High School: Sports day; Annual prize distribution day,

8:30 a.m.

Dhanalakshmi Srinivasan College of Engineering: Quiz programme for young minds, Auditorium, 10 a.m.

Bishop Ambrose College: Sports day, 2 p.m.

Kovai Medical Center and Hospital Limited: Guest lecture on ‘An Introduction to Drug Procurement and Inventory Management’,

11 a.m.

Sri Ramakrishna Institute of Technology: Workshop on ‘Disaster Mitigation & Strengthening of Structures using Micro Piling’, Seminar hall, 9 a.m.

5 {+t}{+h} Pillar: Training on ‘Right to Information Act’, T.V. Samy road, R.S. Puram, 4 p.m.

G.R. Damodaran Academy of Management: Entrepreneurship week, valediction, 10 a.m.

Nehru Arts and Science College: National Level Technical Symposium “Electroholix”,

10 a.m.

Kovai Modelers Club: First On-road GT Race, Gedee Driving Institute, 4:30 p.m.

Angappa CBSE Senior Secondary School: Annual day celebrations, 4:30 p.m.

Dakshina: Life Transforming Program, Vennila building, Peelamedu, 6 p.m.

The Coimbatore Productivity Council: Productivity week celebration, Council conference hall, 5:30 p.m.

KGISL Institute of Management: National conference on ‘Advance Computing and IT Applications’, IIM Auditorium, 10 a.m.

Kumaraguru College of technology: Inter- Collegiate Techno Cultural fest, 9:30 a.m.

PSG College of Nursing: Conference on ‘Neonatal Nurses: Champions for Survival of Neonates’, PSG IMS&R Auditorium, 11 a.m.

Sankara Institute of Management Science: Workshop on ‘Short Management Lesson’ by Mumbai Dabbawala, 2 p.m.

Kovai Kalaimagal Matriculation Higher Secondary School: Annual day celebrations, CIMAT Auditorium, 2 p.m.

PSG Polytechnic College: National Level Technical Symposium ‘Polymeet’, 9 a.m.

Rathinam College of Arts and Science: Faculty development programme on ‘E- Resources for Teaching, Learning and Research’, 10 a.m.

Coimbatore Management Association: Student Management Day, GRG School, Peelamedu, 8:30 a.m.

PSG College of Arts and Science: Inter Collegiate meet ‘Cascall 2k16’, GRD Auditorium,

9 a.m.

Inner Wheel Clubs: Greener Kovai – Planting of Saplings, Charlottee De Vos, President of Inner Wheel International, Mamta Agarwal – President of Inner Wheel Clubs Association of India, Chitra Vivek – District Chairman of Inner Wheel, near RAF Camp, Vellalore, 11 a.m.

Dhanalakshmi Srinivasan College of Engineering: Lecture on Wireless and Mobile Communication, 9.30 a.m.

UDHAGAMANDALAM

Bird Count India: The great backyard bird count, 8:30 a.m.

Nilgiri Natural History Society: Campus bird count, Lawrence School, Lovedale, 3 p.m.
title: In Coimbatore Today
